thread.title: Jersey States look for alternative to paycards
thread.title_full: Jersey States look for alternative to paycards - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Jersey States look for alternative to paycards
text:
Jerseyâ€™s government is looking to change the way drivers pay to park.
They want to introduce an alternative to paycards and parking discs.
More flexible methods of payment are being looked for and once decided, they will then roll it out across the island.
However do you think the paycards and parking discs should be scrapped all together? Take our poll.
